subject: Basketball
Football
lead_paragraph: LeBron James said that football was his first love, and it is not difficult imagining him as an N.F.L. player. Had he not entered the N.B.A., he could be hauling in touchdowns instead of alley-oops.
snippet: LeBron James said that football was his first love, and it is not difficult imagining him as an N.F.L. player. Had he not entered the N.B.A., he could be hauling in touchdowns instead of alley-oops.
